thread.title: U.S. warns 'unwise' for Syria to use weaponized gas, slams Russia

title: U.S. warns 'unwise' for Syria to use weaponized gas, slams Russia
text:
U.S. warns 'unwise' for Syria to use weaponized gas, slams Russia 10:00am EDT - 01:05 
U.S. Defense Secretary Jim Mattis warned Syria on Sunday it would be ''very unwise'' for government forces to use weaponized gas, as he cited unconfirmed reports of chlorine attacks in eastern Ghouta and slammed Russian support for Damascus. Rough Cut
